head.title: (Sort-Of) Sweet and Sour Chicken (Also Good with Just Veg

ing.item: Can of pineapple chunks in heavy syrup

directions.step:
I usually roast a whole chicken every Sunday, then use the leftovers for sandwiches and other meals. Here's what I made tonight:
mix all of the above (actually, use only the syrup from the pineapple) and then heat in a saucepan until it thickens. Add water if you need more sauce.
Then add whatever veggies you want: Pineapple, carrots, onions, peppers, celery. Let them soften (especially the carrots: add them first). Add chicken. Serve over rice.
